definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
12th earthly branch: 9-11 p.m., 10th solar month (7th November-6th December), year of the Boar/ancient Chinese compass point: 330°
to examine/to check up on/to assess/to review/appraisal/review/evaluation
to audit and determine/to check and ratify/to appraise and decide/determination/on a deemed basis (taxation)/to deem
to reconsider/to reexamine/to review (e.g. a report prior to accepting it)

sentences.english: Residents fled smack into the plume of air carrying radioactive debris.
sentences.chinese: 他们直接逃进了空气中充斥着核碎片的地区。

sentences.english: The application principles and methods are demonstrated of nuclear radiation technique in gemmology.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了核辐照技术在宝石学中的应用原理和方法。

sentences.english: The other major trend of the past few years has been the move to multi-core chips.
sentences.chinese: 过去几年的另一个主要趋势是向多核芯片的过渡。

sentences.english: Epidural migration of a sequestrated disc to posterior epidural space is rare.
sentences.chinese: 游离的髓核移位至后方硬膜外间隙是非常少见的。

sentences.english: B is the assumed cross-section of the nucleus.
These kinds of jinn can be killed with date or plum stones fired from a sling.
sentences.chinese: 可以用弹弓发射枣核或者李子核射杀这几种精灵。

sentences.english: L-histidine is an alkalescence amino acid with an imidazole group.
sentences.chinese: 组氨酸是含咪唑核的碱性氨基酸。

sentences.english: Feeding transgenic Synechocystis did not induce the formation of micronucleus and other nuclear abnormalities in erythrocyte.
sentences.chinese: 转基因集胞藻对红细胞微核及核异常没有诱导作用。

sentences.english: I also believe an attack on a us carrier with a strategic missle would lead to nuclear retaliation.
sentences.chinese: 我也相信用战略导弹攻击美国航母会导致核报复。

sentences.english: The basic requirements in nuclear safety review are clarified for class 1E cables of nu- clear power plants.
sentences.chinese: 阐明对核电厂1E级电缆核安全审查的基本要求。

sentences.english: Preliminary inheritance results show that only one pair of recessive nuclear genes control the Pmw trait.
sentences.chinese: 经初步遗传分析，该乳白花性状由单隐性核基因控制。

sentences.english: The evacuation plans came against a background of mounting concern over the possibility of a nuclear catastrophe.
sentences.chinese: 这份撤离方案出台自对核灾难威胁逐步增大的考虑下。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of megakaryocytes and marrow aspirate in diagnosing aplastic anemia.
sentences.chinese: 核细胞数量及骨髓像在再障诊断中的变化。

sentences.english: The policy emphasizes the prevention of nuclear proliferation and nuclear terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 该政策强调防止核扩散及防范核恐怖主义。

sentences.english: Relativistic mean field theory in the rotating frame is used to describe superdeformed nuclei.
sentences.chinese: 用转动框架中的相对论平均场理论描述超形变核。

definition: classifier for coins, rings, badges, pearls, sporting medals, rockets, satellites etc/tree trunk/whip/wooden peg, used as a gag for marching soldiers (old)
classifier for small spheres, pearls, corn grains, teeth, hearts, satellites etc
